briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Alogliptin Used in Combination With Sulfonylurea in Participants With Type 2 Diabetes in Japan

armGroups.label: Alogliptin 12.5 mg QD and Glimepiride QD or BID
Alogliptin 25 mg QD and Glimepiride QD or BID
Glimepiride 1, 2, 3 or 4 mg QD or BID

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Had been taking a sulfonylurea for at least 4 weeks prior to the initiation of the observation period (Week -12).
2. Had been taking glimepiride at a stable dose regimen (1, 2, 3 or 4 mg/day, once or twice daily in the morning or in the morning and evening, before or after meal) for at least 12 weeks prior to the initiation of the treatment period (Week 0).
3. Had glycosylated hemoglobin (HbA1c) of 7.0% or more and below 10.0% at 8 weeks after the initiation of the observation period (Week -4).
4. Had an HbA1c difference between 4 weeks after the initiation of the observation period (Week -8) and 8 weeks after the initiation of the observation period (Week -4) being within 10.0%\* of the value at 4 weeks after the initiation of the observation period (Week -8) (\*rounded off to the first decimal place).
5. Was receiving specific diet and exercise (if any) therapies during the observation period.

Exclusion Criteria:

1\. Had taken other diabetic medications than glimepiride within 12 weeks before the initiation of the treatment period (Week 0).

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Glycosylated Hemoglobin (Week 12).
outcomeMeasures.description: The change in the value of glycosylated hemoglobin (the concentration of glucose bound to hemoglobin as a percent of the absolute maximum that can be bound) collected at week 12 or final visit and glycosylated hemoglobin collected at baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Glycosylated Hemoglobin (Week 2).
outcomeMeasures.description: The change in the value of glycosylated hemoglobin (the concentration of glucose bound to hemoglobin as a percent of the absolute maximum that can be bound) collected at week 2 and glycosylated hemoglobin collected at baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Glycosylated Hemoglobin (Week 4).
outcomeMeasures.description: The change in the value of glycosylated hemoglobin (the concentration of glucose bound to hemoglobin as a percent of the absolute maximum that can be bound) collected at week 4 and glycosylated hemoglobin collected at baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Glycosylated Hemoglobin (Week 8).
outcomeMeasures.description: The change in the value of glycosylated hemoglobin (the concentration of glucose bound to hemoglobin as a percent of the absolute maximum that can be bound) collected at week 8 and glycosylated hemoglobin collected at baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Fasting Plasma Glucose (Week 2).
outcomeMeasures.description: The change between the value of fasting plasma glucose collected at week 2 and baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Fasting Plasma Glucose (Week 4).
outcomeMeasures.description: The change between the value of fasting plasma glucose collected at week 4 and baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Fasting Plasma Glucose (Week 8).
outcomeMeasures.description: The change between the value of fasting plasma glucose collected at week 8 and baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Fasting Plasma Glucose (Week 12).
outcomeMeasures.description: The change between the value of fasting plasma glucose collected at week 12 or final visit and baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Blood Glucose Measured by the Meal Tolerance Test (Week 12).
outcomeMeasures.description: The change between the value of blood glucose measured by the meal tolerance test collected at week 12 or final visit and blood glucose measured by the meal tolerance test collected at baseline. Meal tolerance test measures blood glucose through blood samples drawn before a meal and at 2 hours after the start of the meal.
